thread.title: Boyer & Associates Hosts Webinar “Top Signs That Your Accounting Software is Hurting Your Business and What You Can Do About It” on October 29
thread.title_full: Boyer & Associates Hosts Webinar “Top Signs That Your Accounting Software is Hurting Your Business and What You Can Do About It” on October 29

author: Jack Boyer
title: Boyer & Associates Hosts Webinar “Top Signs That Your Accounting Software is Hurting Your Business and What You Can Do About It” on October 29
text:
Boyer & Associates, a Minneapolis-based provider of Microsoft business management solutions, will be hosting a webinar, “Top Signs That Your Accounting Software is Hurting Your Business and What You Can Do About It”, on October 29, 2015 at 11:00 a.m. CT. This free webinar is geared toward companies and organizations that are in the market for a better financial management solution. During the webinar we will share with attendees some of the top signs that they may be ready for a new accounting solution and how Microsoft Dynamics ERP can take help take their businesses to the next level. We will compare and contrast the three leading Microsoft Dynamics ERP solutions including Microsoft Dynamics GP, Microsoft Dynamics NAV, and Microsoft Dynamics SL and how they may be a fit for an organization.
The webinar is free and is targeted toward executives, directors, and managers in finance, accounting, operations and IT, who are experiencing issues with their current accounting/ERP system and want a better understanding of how Dynamics ERP can make a positive impact on their organization.
Spots are filling up! For more information on the webinar, click here .
About Boyer & Associates
Since 1994, Boyer has helped growing and mid-market organizations throughout the upper Midwest to identify, evaluate, and implement technology solutions and resources that improve operational efficiency and increase revenue. As a Microsoft Partner, with Gold competencies in ERP, Boyer is the only Twin Cities based partner to offer local resources on all three middle market based ERP solutions (Microsoft Dynamics GP, Dynamics NAV, and Dynamics SL) Boyer has a strong focus in serving medical products companies and not for profit organizations. For more information, visit http://www.boyerassoc.com
